markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fumesoul](/Feats.aspx?ID=2591) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 114 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

The air inside you asserts itself as a toxic miasma, inuring you to most [poisons](/Traits.aspx?ID=126). You gain resistance to poison equal to half your level (minimum 1).
name: Fumesoul
